class.name: gd_CDF_SubComponentStatus
class.brief_description: Binding wrapper for the OpenCASCADE CDF_SubComponentStatus enum.
class.description: This class provides Godot GDExtension bindings for the CDF_SubComponentStatus enum from OpenCASCADE. No methods are exposed; only the enum values are available for use in scripts.
